title: Tech that refuses to die
description: Technology is always changing! Or is it...?

vocabItems.definition: no longer in use, having been replaced by something newer, better or more fashionable

vocabItems.word: if it ain’t broke, don’t fix it
vocabItems.definition: (idiom) used to say that if something is working satisfactorily, there is no reason to try to change it
machinery using metal springs and wheels which move when wound up with a key
the traditional typewriter arrangement of keys in which the top line begins with the letters q,w,e,r, t and y
using exactly the same words as were originally used
